bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
time->Tue Jun 7 17:43:45 2016 type=AVC msg=audit(1465317825.827:914): avc: denied { create } for pid=13865 comm="hostapd" scontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tclass=netlink_generic_socket permissive=1 ---- time->Tue Jun 7 17:43:45 2016 type=AVC msg=audit(1465317825.828:915): avc: denied { setopt } for pid=13865 comm="hostapd" scontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tclass=netlink_generic_socket permissive=1 ---- time->Tue Jun 7 17:43:45 2016 type=AVC msg=audit(1465317825.828:916): avc: denied { bind } for pid=13865 comm="hostapd" scontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tclass=netlink_generic_socket permissive=1 ---- time->Tue Jun 7 17:43:45 2016 type=AVC msg=audit(1465317825.828:917): avc: denied { getattr } for pid=13865 comm="hostapd" scontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:system_r:hostapd_t:s0 tclass=netlink_generic_socket permissive=1
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
selinux-policy-3.13.1-190.fc24.noarch
